name: rmobii
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wrmo(s0, c0, w0), wrmo(s0, c0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wrmo(s0, c0, w0), wrmo(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrmo(s0, c0, w0), wrmo(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrmo(s0, c0, w0), wrmo(s0, c0, w1))
-| wb(w0, w1)

comment: Formula-building rule for restricted existential quantifier (inference form). (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)
